en.sectionText1: This survey is intended for people above the age of 18. Thank you for taking the time to submit your responses.
en.sectionText2: This survey is intended for people who own a car, Thank you for taking the time to submit your responses.
en.sectionText3: We are targeting more experienced clients, thank you for your interest.
en.sectionText4: Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey.
en.doesntCareEmissions: Targetables do not care about emissions:
en.question3: Do you own a car driving license?
en.question6: Are you worried about fuel emissions?
en.question7: How many cars do you have in your family?
en.welcomeHead: Please note that this survey is intended for experienced drivers above the age of 18.
